metadata.name: Reagan Estate Auction Metaverse Reissues: Mrs. Ronald Reagan A Dressing Mirror
metadata.description:
‘Reagan Estate Auction Metaverse Reissues’ by Simon Denny digitally reimagines items from the private collection of President and Mrs. Ronald Reagan auctioned by Christie’s in 2016. Two lots from the sale – a dressing mirror belonging to Nancy Reagan and a decorative glass bottle by Wang Xisan bearing her likeness – are mintable here.

Created in conjunction with a print advertisement in the inaugural hard-copy Zora Zine. Minting is free and available from the time of Zora Zine’s publication until 6 March, 2023.

Development assistance by Jakob Sitter.
